title: Ben Preston (Auto Journalist)
description:
Ben Preston is an automotive journalist who has written for Hagerty, Road & Track, The/DRIVE, and Jalopnik. 

https://www.roadandtrack.com/author/3043/benjamin-preston/

https://www.hagerty.com/articles-videos/author/benjamin-preston

Watch the show! https://youtu.be/YO0GBryGeaE

 

T: @thesmokingtire @zackklapman @benjamachine

IG: @thesmokingtire @fakezackklapman @bennynewsman
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
